itemListElement.name: Hemp-Tofu in Rich Creamy Pasanda sauce. Vegan ‘Paneer’ Pasanda. Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe

@graph.name: Hemp Tofu Pasanda Curry
@graph.description: This Tofu Pasanda recipe is intriguing and easy. Tofu crisped with spices and cooked in a special Pasanda sauce which pleases all. Indian Vegan Gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 1 8 oz pack Hemp-Tofu cubed 1/2- 3/4 inch cubes (regular or Chimicurri flavor, or use Firm Tofu, pressed and cubed)
2 tsp oil (use less or more to preference)
1 Tbsp pumpkin seeds or sunfllower seeds
1/2 tsp white or black poppy seeds (khus khus)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat at medium. Add the cubed Hemp-tofu, garam masala and cinnamon and cook for 4-5 minutes or until lightly golden on some edges. Remove from pan and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil and heat at medium. Add the cubed Hemp-tofu, garam masala and cinnamon and cook for 4-5 minutes or until lightly golden on some edges. Remove from pan and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: To the same pan, add onion and cook for 4-5 minutes until translucent. Add garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, fennel seeds, clove, pumpkin seeds, poppy seeds and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: To the same pan, add onion and cook for 4-5 minutes until translucent. Add garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, fennel seeds, clove, pumpkin seeds, poppy seeds and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomato and cook for 4-5 minutes until saucy. Mash the larger tomato pieces while it cooks.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomato and cook for 4-5 minutes until saucy. Mash the larger tomato pieces while it cooks.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool slightly and blend to a smooth puree with a 1/2 cup coconut milk. Blend well until the poppy seeds break down.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool slightly and blend to a smooth puree with a 1/2 cup coconut milk. Blend well until the poppy seeds break down.

recipeInstructions.text: Add puree back to the pan. Add water, paprika, cayenne, salt and sugar and the hemp-tofu cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add puree back to the pan. Add water, paprika, cayenne, salt and sugar and the hemp-tofu cubes.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well. Cover and cook on low-medium heat for 15-18 minutes or until the sauce thickens and the tofu picks on the color. Stir twice in between. taste and adjust salt, spice. The curry needs to cook through to cook the poppy seeds which are somewhat grassy uncooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well. Cover and cook on low-medium heat for 15-18 minutes or until the sauce thickens and the tofu picks on the color. Stir twice in between. taste and adjust salt, spice. The curry needs to cook through to cook the poppy seeds which are somewhat grassy uncooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with rice/quinoa, flatbread, Naan.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with rice/quinoa, flatbread, Naan.
